summary.span: 命名空间包含扩展设计时用户界面 (UI) 逻辑和绘制的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that extend design-time user interface (UI) logic and drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的类可以用于创建自定义工具箱项，可以编辑和以图形方式表示其支持的类型，并可以将某些类型之间的值转换的类型转换器的值的特定类型的值编辑器。The classes in this namespace can be used to create custom toolbox items, type-specific value editors that can edit and graphically represent values of their supported types, and type converters that can convert values between certain types. 此命名空间提供了基本框架开发扩展设计时用户界面。This namespace provides the basic frameworks for developing extensions to the design-time UI. > [!CAUTION] > 类中用于 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服务中不支持命名空间。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
